action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes three spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, or 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the giant can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 10 feet of the giant, the giant can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
